doc.field: Cortelyou and Bergen houses photograph collection
Cortelyou and Bergen houses photograph collection

This series consists of 21 glass negatives along with their original paper sleeves with handwritten captions. Most of the images are of 7 different historic houses which belonged to various members of the Cortelyou and Bergen families in Brooklyn. The images were taken ca. 1899-1913. The houses, built during the 17th, 18th and 19th centuries, have all since been demolished. One image is an undated portrait of Teunis Cortelyou. One glass negative is broken and unusable.
Cortelyou and Bergen houses photograph collection
